data.name: Magicae Mundi
data.detailed_description:
Magicae Mundi is a fun, action-packed game that brings a completely online PVP experience to its players. You are given the freedom to create your own matches, play alone or in teams, and to choose your own magical character for battle!

You battle with up to 10 players per match and can custom pick the number of players, game modes, and even change teams. It's all up to you!

Satisfied with the current players in the room? You can lock the battle room so that other's can't enter!

Once a battle starts, it will take all your skill to master the magical characters. Use all your strategy, guile and expertise to defeat your opponents, before they defeat you.

The winner is the last left alive!

Main features:

° Several servers around the globe, to provide you with the best experience
° Choose your own scenario when creating your game
° Choose your own character for battle



° Play individually or part of a team
° You can use the following powers: a melee attack, basic attack, super attack, simple defense power, healing power and advanced defense power. Choose them in the spellbook!



_____________________________________________________________________________________________

SERVERS IN DISCORD

data.short_description: In the world of Magicae Mundi, you enter a scenario with up to 10 players and must fight using the spells in your spell book until the last opponent is eliminated!
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, French, Simplified Chinese, Greek, Japanese
data.reviews:
“Multiplayer witchcraft action in the form of duels wizards - pretty simple graphics, good optimization, interesting gameplay, if you always wanted to be Harry Potter.”
Club Games Reviewer

“Yes.”
Vale la pena?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E5200 (2.5GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4th Generation or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4130 or higher
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9500 GT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.3
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E5200 (2.5GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4th Generation or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.3
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9500 GT or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E5200 (2.5GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4th Generation or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9500 GT or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
